case.title: EBONY LOOKING FOR A TALL,WHITE,PROFESSIONAL,MALE - 38 (N LONDON)
case.text:
Ebony looking for a Tall,White ,Professional, Male. who has a great outlook in life, and that can also enjoy/appreciate the finer things life has to offer......
I love Travel, Reading ,the Arts, and can appreciate different cuisines / cultures
would love to meet up with someone that has the same views /'tastes..... please reply with a small note about yourself.and a pic,
PLEASE NOTE NO PIC = NO REPLY
